name: Terrier Tennis
description:
Terrier Tennis

Terrier Tennis is a product of my own self created game jam of 6 Games in 12 Months. This is the second game in the jam where the user takes on the role of the titular terrier who loves to play tennis. You compete in six quick matches against your fellow dogs to see who is the best tennis player!

Check out my ongoing DevLog for the 6 Games in 12 Months game jam to stay tuned for future games in this series!
